author: Staff Reporter
text: Vaaniyaaru reservoir was opened for irrigation for a 48-day cycle here in Paapireddypatty on Wednesday. A total of 10, 517 acres are slated to be brought under its watershed in 16 villages of Paapireddypatty. Water will be released to Alapuram, Venkatasamudram, Ondhiyampatty, Thenkaraikottai, Parayapatty, Molayanur, Kozhimekkanur, Adhikaripatty, Paapireddypatty, Thandampatty, Gowndampatty, Pudupatty, Devarajapalayam , Menasi, Boodanatham, and Jammanhalli villages. Earlier, Collector K. Vivekanandan opened the shutters of the reservoir here.
title: Reservoir opened for irrigation
